title: I've tried everything, I still can't get the play button to become clickable
body:
The play button was grayed out for me.

So I initiated a repair, twice! Nope, still didn't work.

Uninstalled League and reinstalled. Nope, didn't work.

There's nothing else to do. Please help me here.

replies.body:
When the play button is unclickable, there's a chance that it's being caused by an unstable connection. If the client can't make the connection to our game servers, it won't let you click play because it won't be able to connect you to anyone.

Check out our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and we should be able to get that play button lit up!

Thank you for responding.
I contacted Riot support and we recently (like 10 mins ago) got it to work again.

It was a security problem.
